```py
scipy.linalg.pinvh(a, atol=None, rtol=None, lower=True, return_rank=False, check_finite=True)
```

```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.linalg import pinvh
>>> rng = np.random.default_rng()
>>> a = rng.standard_normal((9, 6))
>>> a = np.dot(a, a.T)
>>> B = pinvh(a)
>>> np.allclose(a, a @ B @ a)
True
>>> np.allclose(B, B @ a @ B)
True 
```
